name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】hololive 5th Generation Live ＂Twinkle 4 You＂ 【#ねぽらぼT4U】 [RRH29-R71T0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: NePoLaBo performing 'Twinkle 4 You' during their 5th Generation Live 'Twinkle 4 You'.
NePoLaBo performing 'Hyper Jumpin'' during their 5th Generation Live 'Twinkle 4 You'.

subtitles.original: だって楽しすぎて止まらない
subtitles.english: Because it's too much fun to stop

subtitles.original: 輝くステージでもっともっとずっと
subtitles.english: On the shining stage, more and more, forever

subtitles.original: みんなー！会いたかったぞー！！
subtitles.english: Everyone! I've wanted to see you!!

subtitles.original: ねねも！会いたかったよー！会いたかったよー！
subtitles.english: Nene too! I've wanted to see you! I've wanted to see you!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい　楽しい　愛おしいだけじゃ語れない
subtitles.english: Happy, fun, precious, I can't just describe it with those

subtitles.original: 今も今も悩みはあるけれど
subtitles.english: Even now, even now, there are worries, but...

subtitles.original: ここにいるよ　私　ここにいるよ
subtitles.english: I'm here, I'm right here

subtitles.original: 君と同じ世界を
subtitles.english: The same world as you

subtitles.original: 見つめて
subtitles.english: Gazing at it

subtitles.original: キラメキライター！
subtitles.english: Twinkle Writer!

subtitles.original: 生まれたてのドキドキを響かせよう
subtitles.english: Let the brand-new heartbeats resound

subtitles.original: 最高の時間　最高の仲間と
subtitles.english: The best time, with the best friends

subtitles.original: ここにいるよ　見つけてくれたから
subtitles.english: I'm here, because you found me

subtitles.original: 君に会いたくてやってきたんだ
subtitles.english: I came here because I wanted to see you

subtitles.original: みんな歌おう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, sing!

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, go!

subtitles.original: 終わらないメロディ
subtitles.english: The never-ending melody

subtitles.original: キラメキに乗って
subtitles.english: Riding on the sparkle

subtitles.original: キラメキまとって
subtitles.english: Wearing the sparkle

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: みんなー！2曲目からも飛ばしていくぞー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! We're gonna keep it going from the second song too!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 今日は楽しんでいってね！
subtitles.english: Please enjoy today!

subtitles.original: それっ　ずっと　どこまでも踏み出そう
subtitles.english: That's it, let's step out forever, anywhere

subtitles.original: 銀河の真ん中　笑い合って
subtitles.english: In the middle of the galaxy, laughing together

subtitles.original: みんな！ペンライトもっともっと見せてー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Show your penlights more and more!

subtitles.original: もっともっと見せてー！
subtitles.english: Show them more and more!

subtitles.original: 一歩目が　すでに幾何学
subtitles.english: The first step is already geometric

subtitles.original: きらり　渦に巻き込まれた
subtitles.english: Sparkling, I was swept into the vortex

subtitles.original: 違うよ　出会いたくて
subtitles.english: No, I wanted to meet you

subtitles.original: ほら　みんな　ここにいる
subtitles.english: Look, everyone is here

subtitles.original: 夢じゃないようで　だけどね
subtitles.english: It doesn't seem like a dream, but you know

subtitles.original: ファンタジーじゃない予感
subtitles.english: A premonition that it's not fantasy

subtitles.original: 流星群　負けないよ
subtitles.english: Meteor shower, I won't lose

subtitles.original: 光　放って
subtitles.english: Releasing the light

subtitles.original: どんな憧れも　飛び越えて
subtitles.english: Surpassing any yearning

subtitles.original: 銀河の真ん中　更新しよう
subtitles.english: In the middle of the galaxy, let's update

subtitles.original: キラメキの標にさ　足跡だって星になる
subtitles.english: The footprints on the beacon of sparkle will also become stars

subtitles.original: One Two Three Yeah! 弾き散りばめ
subtitles.english: One Two Three Yeah! Scattering the sparks

subtitles.original: One Two Three Yeah! 山彦伝播
subtitles.english: One Two Three Yeah! Echoing propagation

subtitles.original: One Two Three Yeah! 旅していく季節が
subtitles.english: One Two Three Yeah! The season we travel through

subtitles.original: 今始まったんだよ　きっと
subtitles.english: Has surely just begun

subtitles.original: 銀河の心臓はいつも
subtitles.english: The heart of the galaxy is always

subtitles.original: 燃えてるんだ　恒星のよう
subtitles.english: Burning, like a fixed star

subtitles.original: だからね　手を繋いだら
subtitles.english: So, if we hold hands

subtitles.original: 生まれるものがある
subtitles.english: Something will be born

subtitles.original: それは新しい宇宙
subtitles.english: That is a new universe

subtitles.original: 君と描く場所
subtitles.english: The place I draw with you

subtitles.original: 仲間集め　世界を作ろう
subtitles.english: Gather friends, let's create a world

subtitles.original: 気づいてみたら　冒険の真っ只中　星の海を渡れ　スパークルで
subtitles.english: When I realized it, I was in the middle of an adventure, cross the sea of stars with a sparkle

subtitles.original: どこまでも踏み出そう
subtitles.english: Let's step out forever

subtitles.original: 星雲をかき分けて
subtitles.english: Pushing through the nebula

subtitles.original: 無限の空が待ってるよ
subtitles.english: The infinite sky is waiting

subtitles.original: 準備OK？　逆らってけ！
subtitles.english: Ready? Go against it!

subtitles.original: 輝きは止まらない
subtitles.english: The sparkle won't stop

subtitles.original: 銀河の真ん中　新世界
subtitles.english: In the middle of the galaxy, a new world

subtitles.original: 君となら行けるから　願いの向こう　未来へと
subtitles.english: Since I can go if I'm with you, beyond the wish, to the future

subtitles.original: One Two Three Yeah! 弾き散りばめ
subtitles.english: One Two Three Yeah! Scattering the sparks

subtitles.original: One Two Three Yeah! 山彦伝播
subtitles.english: One Two Three Yeah! Echoing propagation

subtitles.original: One Two Three Yeah! 旅していく季節が
subtitles.english: One Two Three Yeah! The season we travel through

subtitles.original: 今始まったんだよ　きっと
subtitles.english: Has surely just begun
